Detailed Description

A (labeled) training set.

Definition: A (labeled) training set is a set of (labeled) training patterns.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

NeuralNetwork.Teachers.TrainingSet.TrainingSet ( int  inputVectorLength,
int  outputVectorLength 
)

Creates a new (labeled) training set.

Parameters:
inputVectorLength The length of the input vector.
outputVectorLength The length of the output vector.
Exceptions:
ArgumentException Condition 1: inputVectorLength is less than or equal to zero. Condition 2: outputVectorLength is less than or equal to zero.

NeuralNetwork.Teachers.TrainingSet.TrainingSet ( string  trainingSetFileName  ) 

Creates a new (labeled) training set from a file.

Parameters:
trainingSetFileName The name of the file containing the training set.

Member Function Documentation

void NeuralNetwork.Teachers.TrainingSet.Add ( TrainingSet  trainingSet  ) 

Adds a given training set to the training set.

Parameters:
trainingSet The training set to be added.
Exceptions:
ArgumentException Condition: trainingSet is not compatible with this training set. This happens when either their input vector lengths or their output vector lengths differ.

void NeuralNetwork.Teachers.TrainingSet.Add ( TrainingPattern  trainingPattern  ) 

Adds a (supervised) training pattern to the training set.

Note that if the training pattern already exists in the set, it will be replaced.

Parameters:
trainingPattern The training pattern to add.
Exceptions:
ArgumentNullException Condition: trainingPattern is null.
ArgumentException Condition: the lengths of input vector or output vector (from the training pattern) differ from their expected lengths (from the training set).

void NeuralNetwork.Teachers.TrainingSet.Clear (  ) 

Removes all training patterns from the training set.

bool NeuralNetwork.Teachers.TrainingSet.Contains ( TrainingPattern  trainingPattern  ) 

Determines whether the training set contains a training pattern.

Parameters:
trainingPattern The training sample to check for containment.
Returns:
True if contains, false otherwise.

bool NeuralNetwork.Teachers.TrainingSet.Remove ( TrainingPattern  trainingPattern  ) 

Removes a training pattern from the training set.

Parameters:
trainingPattern The training sample to remove.
Returns:
True if successful, false otherwise.

override string NeuralNetwork.Teachers.TrainingSet.ToString (  ) 

Returns a string that represents the training set.

Returns:
A string that represents the training set.

Property Documentation

int NeuralNetwork.Teachers.TrainingSet.InputVectorLength [get]

Gets the length of the input vector.

The length of the input vector. Note that this is always greater than zero.

int NeuralNetwork.Teachers.TrainingSet.OutputVectorLength [get]

Gets the length of the output vector.

The length of the output vector. Note that this is always greater than zero.

int NeuralNetwork.Teachers.TrainingSet.Size [get]

Gets the size of the training set (i.e. the number of training patterns in the training set).

The size of the training set. Note that this is always always greater then or equal to zero.
